biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  Tim Dixon (born 19 February 1984) is an English television presenter who rose to promise in 2003. Aged just 21, in 2005 he was described by Flextech as "The best young up-and-coming television presenting talent in the UK".

Description above from the Wikipedia article Tim Dixon , licensed under CC-BY-SA,full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Tim Dixon
